student.long: Are you a student at this university?

psychology.long: Do you study psychology at this university?

first_year.long: Are you a first-year student at this university?

basketball.long: So do you play basketball on Thursdays?

experiment.short: Have you participated in any experiments before?
experiment.long: Have you participated in any experiments before at this institution?

live.long: Do you live by yourself or with someone else?

work.short: Do you work on the side?
work.long: Do you work on the side in addition to your studies?

bike.short: Did you come here by bike?
bike.long: Did you come here by bike this morning?

work.long: Did you drive here this morning?
